name: Merchant Street MAYHEM!
description:
Made solo in one week during the GN! Online Game Jam #1. (23.3.-29.3.2020)

Merchant Street MAYHEM! is a Third Person Shooter where tactics and reflexes will win the day. Move and shoot decisively, while enjoying delicious tactical memery and old-school swing music.

Fight through increasingly challenging levels against varying enemy types, all designed to work together and hunt you down. Take care not to zig when you should have zagged, for one mistake is already too much.

Mastery of the mechanics is key to survival, MSM is designed to be tough in difficulty. Beating the game should feel like an actual achievement.

(Note: Do not turbo mash the melee button, it will render the attack unusable.)
